metadata.title: CVE-2021-47360 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:binder: make sure fd closes completeDuring BC_FREE_BUFFER processing, the BINDER_TYPE_FDA objectcleanup may close 1 or more fds. The close operations arecompleted using the task work mechanism -- which means the threadneeds to return to userspace or the file object may never bedereferenced -- which can lead to hung processes.Force the binder thread back to userspace if an fd is closed duringBC_FREE_BUFFER handling.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
